h1: What is your date of birth?
hint:
These details will be used to help progress your claim.

For example, 23 04 1981.

dobDate.required: You have not entered a date. Enter a date to continue.
dobDate.invalidDate: You have entered an invalid date. Enter the date using the following format: 23 04 1981.
dobDate.invalidYear: You have entered the year in an invalid format. Enter the whole year, for example 1981.
dobDate.invalidDateInFuture: You have entered a date that is in the future. Enter a date that is in the past before continuing.
dobDate.invalidDateTooFarInPast: You have entered a year which is too far in the past.
